title: Unknown stressed sans
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014084508im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-06%20at%2020_6189.27.16%20PM.png)

Looks like [Lydian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014084508/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/lydian/), but it's not.

Does anyone know the name of this font?
author: pookeyblow

comments.content:
It must be **[Klang MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014084508/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Klang%20MT%20-%20Regular&fid=efaad717185380e7c21bbcebfcb2c860&fsize=60&text=SCIENCE%20CLASS&wrap=2)** by Will Carter (1955, Monotype)

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014084508/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
